message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. As we're just starting our conversation, I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us off on the right foot. I'm offering the product to you for $1100000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm afraid $1100000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $1100000 was a bit steep for you, Bob, but I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're trying to get the price as low as possible, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'll offer it to you for $1025000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to make one more offer, and then I'm walking away. I'll sell the product to you for $1015000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll take it seriously.

Alice, I understand you're frustrated, but I'm not willing to pay more than $980000 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering the value it will bring to my business. I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.

Bob, I understand that you're firm on your price, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'll make one more offer, and then I'll have to reconsider my options. I'll sell the product to you for $1012500. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll take it seriously.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to pay more than $980000 for the product. I think that's a fair price, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price. I'm not going to make any further concessions.
